english: The farce was adapted from the french .
chinese: 这出闹剧是根据法国原著改编的。

english: The audience roared at the farce .
The whole caper was unnecessary, in his view .
chinese: 在他看来，整个这出闹剧都是不必要的。

english: Even before dudley found comedy, he discovered music .
chinese: 达德利发现音乐于前，获知闹剧于后。

english: In the final month the whole affair became almost a farce .
chinese: 在最后一个月中，整个情况几乎变成了一场闹剧。
闹剧造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His attempts to copy other slapstick comedians who were popular at that time were a failure .
chinese: 他模仿当时受欢迎的闹剧演员的尝试失败了。

english: Melville has abruptly and entirely altered his story; his prose became lushly melodramatic .
chinese: 在这里梅尔维尔突然把故事改变了，把文章写成热闹的通俗闹剧了。

english: Neither of them imagined they could be personally involved in the dubious result of the scenes they witnessed .
chinese: 他们俩谁也不曾设想，自己会被牵扯进这场他们耳闻目睹的闹剧的含糊不清的结局。

english: The whole house was roaring with laughter and applause, and he saw only an ignoble farce that made him sad .
chinese: 观众看得津津有味，哄堂大笑，不断鼓掌，他却觉得这不过是一出无聊的闹剧，只能使他愁上加愁。

english: If they were allowed their own way, every comedy would have a tragic ending, and every tragedy would culminate in a farce .
chinese: 要是由着他们干的话，每一部喜剧都会有个悲剧性的结局，而每一部悲剧也都以闹剧告终。

english: Friendship, as he saw it, was more and more like an ingenious farce with too much plot and too many characters all acting frenetically .
chinese: 友谊，据他看来，越来越象一出别出心裁的闹剧，情节过于复杂，人物过于纷纭，动作过于疯狂。

english: But i think this goddamn circus has gone on iong enough
chinese: 但我已经受够了这场闹剧

english: But i think this goddamn circus has gone on long enough
chinese: 但我已经受够了这场闹剧

english: Sleepwalk mr . eight experimental farce introduction
chinese: 梦游先生8之实验闹剧游戏攻略

english: You play a farce , which i merely laugh at
chinese: “你在上演一出闹剧，我不过一笑置之。 ”
